newsitem.title: USA: SITEL Corp Q3 Feb 28 net rises.
newsitem.headline: SITEL Corp Q3 Feb 28 net rises.

text.p: The following are results for SITEL Corp for the three and nine months ended February 28. The company is switching to a December 31 calendar year and earlier Tuesday reported results for the year and quarter ended December 31.
(Amounts in thousands except per share data)
Three months ended Nine months ended

a) Includes non-recurring transaction expenses related to the merger with Mitre plc and the acquisition of National Action Financial Services, Inc. Excluding those one-time expenses, operating income, net income and earnings per share were $28.0 million, $17.8 million and $0.27 per share, respectively.
b) Restated to include historical results of Mitre plc and NAFS for the nine-month period ended Feb. 29, 1996.
